Class EquipmentService

java.lang.Object
com.prototype.services.EquipmentService
public class EquipmentService extends Object
Service class responsible for equipment-related operations, including creation, update, deletion, image handling, and Cloudinary uploads. Supports both technological and biomedical equipment.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    EquipmentService()
    Default constructor initializing DAOs for all equipment types.

    • findAll

      public List<Equipment> findAll()
      Retrieves all equipment records, including both technological and biomedical.
      Returns:
      list of Equipment

    • findById

      public Equipment findById(Long id)
      Finds equipment by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the equipment ID
      Returns:
      the matching Equipment
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the ID is null
      RuntimeException - if the equipment does not exist

    • delete

      public void delete(Long id)
      Deletes equipment by ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the equipment ID
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the ID is null
      RuntimeException - if the equipment does not exist

    • takeImage

      public javafx.scene.image.Image takeImage()
      Takes a picture using the CvApi camera module and converts it to a JavaFX Image.
      Returns:
      captured image or null if an error occurs

    • ImageCloud

      public String ImageCloud(javafx.scene.image.Image image)
      Uploads a JavaFX Image to Cloudinary using ApiCloudinary.
      Parameters:
      image - the image to upload
      Returns:
      URL of the stored image, or empty string if an error occurs

    • createTechEquipment

      public Equipment createTechEquipment(String serial, String brand, String model, EquipmentType type, EquipmentStatus state, Long providerId, String imagePath, String os, int ramGB, FrequencyType frequencyType)
      Creates a new technological equipment record.
      Parameters:
      serial - equipment serial number
      brand - equipment brand
      model - equipment model
      type - equipment type
      state - equipment status
      providerId - provider identifier
      imagePath - path or URL of the equipment image
      os - operating system
      ramGB - RAM size in GB
      frequencyType - maintenance frequency type
      Returns:
      created TechEquipment

    • updateTechEquipment

      public TechEquipment updateTechEquipment(Long id, String serial, String brand, String model, EquipmentType type, EquipmentStatus state, Long providerId, String imagePath, String os, int ramGB, FrequencyType frequencyType)
      Updates an existing technological equipment record.
      Parameters:
      id - equipment ID
      serial - serial number
      brand - brand
      model - model
      type - equipment type
      state - equipment status
      providerId - provider ID
      imagePath - image path or URL
      os - operating system
      ramGB - RAM amount
      frequencyType - maintenance frequency
      Returns:
      updated TechEquipment

    • createBiomedicalEquipment

      public BiomedicalEquipment createBiomedicalEquipment(String serial, String brand, String model, EquipmentType type, EquipmentStatus state, Long providerId, String imagePath, String riskClass, String calibrationCert, FrequencyType frequencyType)
      Creates a new biomedical equipment record.
      Parameters:
      serial - equipment serial number
      brand - equipment brand
      model - equipment model
      type - equipment type
      state - equipment status
      providerId - provider ID
      imagePath - equipment image path or URL
      riskClass - biomedical risk class
      calibrationCert - calibration certificate identifier
      frequencyType - maintenance frequency
      Returns:
      created BiomedicalEquipment

      public BiomedicalEquipment updateBiomedicalEquipment(Long id, String serial, String brand, String model, EquipmentType type, EquipmentStatus state, Long providerId, String imagePath, String riskClass, String calibrationCert, FrequencyType frequencyType)

      serial - serial number
      brand - brand
      model - model
      type - equipment type
      state - equipment state
      providerId - provider ID
      imagePath - image path or URL

      Returns:
      updated BiomedicalEquipment
